meta.description: Optimize the weekly production of hardwood and vinyl planks to maximize profit while meeting demand and production constraints.

params.name: demand
params.description: Minimum demand for each product in square feet.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Maximum production capacity for each product in square feet.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per square foot for each product.

vars.name: production
vars.description: Production quantity for each product in square feet.

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from the production of hardwood and vinyl planks.

constraints.name: demand_hardwood
constraints.description: Meet the minimum demand for hardwood.

constraints.name: demand_vinyl
constraints.description: Meet the minimum demand for vinyl.

constraints.name: capacity_hardwood
constraints.description: Do not exceed the production capacity for hardwood.

constraints.name: capacity_vinyl
constraints.description: Do not exceed the production capacity for vinyl.
